skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of removing 1 random buff from all enemies. 

Has a 75% chance of removing 1 random debuff from all allies. Increases the value of [Shield] buffs on all allies by 30% of the damage inflicted.
skills.name: Cavern's Grasp
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Places a [Block Debuffs] buff and a 50% [Increase ATK] on all allies for 2 turns. Also places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 30% of this Champion's MAX HP. The [Shield] buff cannot be removed.
skills.name: Resilient Glow

skills.desc:
Whenever an ally under a [Shield] buff is attacked, reflects 25% of the damage inflicted on the [Shield] back the attacker. Also heals that ally by 25% of the damage inflicted on the [Shield].

If there are multiple Champions in the team with this Skill, only one will activate.
skills.name: Redoubt [P]
